body:
Hello, 

I cant compile on OS X 10.8.5. I'm getting this error:

  CXXLD    bitcoind
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "boost::thread_detail::enter_once_region(boost::once_flag&)", referenced from:
      void boost::call_once<void (*)()>(boost::once_flag&, void (*)())in libbitcoin.a(util.o)
      boost::spirit::classic::impl::object_with_id_base<boost::spirit::classic::impl::grammar_tag, unsigned long>::acquire_object_id()in libbitcoin.a(rpcclient.o)
  "boost::thread_detail::commit_once_region(boost::once_flag&)", referenced from:
      void boost::call_once<void (*)()>(boost::once_flag&, void (*)())in libbitcoin.a(util.o)
      boost::spirit::classic::impl::object_with_id_base<boost::spirit::classic::impl::grammar_tag, unsigned long>::acquire_object_id()in libbitcoin.a(rpcclient.o)
  "boost::thread_detail::rollback_once_region(boost::once_flag&)", referenced from:
      void boost::call_once<void (*)()>(boost::once_flag&, void (*)())in libbitcoin.a(util.o)
      boost::spirit::classic::impl::object_with_id_base<boost::spirit::classic::impl::grammar_tag, unsigned long>::acquire_object_id()in libbitcoin.a(rpcclient.o)
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
collect2: ld returned 1 exit status

I did install boost via MacPorts:

$ port installed | grep boost
  boost @1.55.0_0+no_single+no_static+python27 (active)

Any advice?
title: boost lib problems on build
